scripts.build: npm run clean && echo 'Compiling Typescript' && tsc --version && tsc --pretty
scripts.major-release-candidate: npm version premajor --preid rc && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.minor-release-candidate: npm version preminor --preid rc && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.next-release-candidate: npm version prerelease --preid rc && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.patch-release-candidate: npm version prepatch --preid rc && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.pre-release: npm version prerelease --preid rc && npm publish --tag beta
